name: Lumbo-Pelvic Drop Piece
descr:
Designed to withstand the weight and forces of pelvic adjusting, this durable unit has a crisp drop. The broad base will distribute the weight and adjusting forces across a wide area on cushioned surfaces. Made to be as thin as possible, and tapered down toward the back to be as comfortable as possible for the patient.

Specifications: 31x51x9 cm.

Available as standard in black and other colours available of extra charge and time of delivery.
